clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in inflammatory disorders unspecified and psoriasis and psoriatic disorders

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: VX 765 is an orally absorbed pro drug of VRT 043198 a potent and selective inhibitor of ICE caspase 1 sub family caspases It has been shown to reduce disease severity and the expression of inflammatory mediators in models of rheumatoid arthritis and skin inflammation suggesting that it may be useful for treatment of inflammatory diseases
